name: Deadly Cosmic
storyline: Deadly Cosmic is a short, but fun game inspired by horror games from the 90s.You play as Raquel, a scientist who needs to save her co workers from an accident. But something sinister is happening to the facility. What are those creatures? Where did they come from? And the most important: can she survive?
summary:
In Deadly Cosmic you play as Raquel, a scientist who needs to save her co-workers from an accident at the establishment where she works, but something is wrong. What happened to the company? What are these creatures? Most importantly, will she be able to survive?

Deadly Cosmic is a short but fun game, inspired by the classic survival horrors of the 90s. We made this game in 15 days for a GameJam (Unexpected Jam), but this is an enhanced and complete version of the game made after the results.
